0: The rooms and facilities are pretty outdated with separate beds a desk in the middle of the room and an old bathroom
We was given the 7th floor with a very frightening view
Free wifi in lobby but in the rooms you pay 15 euro for 24 hrs hardly unreasonable in view of the room rates
We have been told that it was an option to pay for but we did not see it on the website while booking
Overall the hotel seemed dated in need of refresh
The rooms were basic but had most things you need to make the stay pleasant
Scrambled eggs were rock solid both days but plenty of other things to choose from
Price is acceptable due to high hotel fee in Holland
the toilet seat was loose the shower fixture was coming away from the the wall the vanity mirror did not illuminate
Although we had informed the hotel staff nothing was done till our check out day
1: close to the hotel there are good resturant and metro and tram are next to hotel
Loved the record player and choice of music
Good and comfortable beds airco bed reading lights which even include a usb charger
Beds were very comfortable and good size room
The system with de computers was very useful and user friendly
Great location and good value for money but nothing too special
Markthal and R’dam Tues Sat market within a few mins walking distance
Great restaurant Pazo or something at walking distance by the way
